alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 27 at 1:31AM EST until November 27 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 AM CST FOR NORTHWESTERN JACKSON...NORTH CENTRAL WALTON...HOLMES AND NORTH CENTRAL WASHINGTON COUNTIES... At 1231 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles southwest of Geneva to near Chipley, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Campbellton, Noma, Richter Crossroads, Cerrogordo, Tendil Crossing, Darlington, Gritney, Arrant Settlement, Glendale, Holland Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Smith Crossroads, Jacobs and Hickory Hill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
